pages.text: 29|53|Ara tara apanake sasti tbaranbita karate bale. Ara yadi nirdharita kala na thakata tabe sasti abasya'i tadera upara asata. Ara niscaya tadera upara sasti asabe akasmikabhabe, athaca tara upalad'dhi'o karabe na.
29|54|Tara apanake sasti tbaranbita karate bale, ara jahannama to kaphiraderake paribestana karabe'i.
29|55|Sedina sasti taderake acchanna karabe tadera upara theke o tadera nica theke. Ara tini balabena, â€˜tomara ya karate ta asbadana karaâ€™.
29|56|He amara mumina bandagana! Niscaya amara yamina prasasta; kaje'i tomara amara'i ibadata kara [1].
29|57|Jiba matra'i mrtyura sbada grahanakari; tarapara tomara amadera'i kache pratyabartita habe [1].

29|58|Ara yara imana ane o satkaja kare amara abasya'i tadera basabasera jan'ya su'ucca prasada dana karaba jannate, yara padadese nadisamuha prabahita [1], yekhane tara sthayi habe, kata uttama pratidana se sakala karmasiladera jan'ya
29|59|yara dhairya dharana kare [1] ebam tadera rabera upara'i ta'oyakkula kare [2].
29|60|Ara emana kata jibajantu rayeche yara nijedera riyika majuda rakhe na. Allahi riyika dana karena taderake o tomaderake; ara tini sarbasrota, sarbajna [1].

29|61|Ara yadi apani taderake jijnesa karena, 'ke asamanasamuha o yaminake srsti karechena ebam candra-suryake niyantrita karechena?' Tara abasya'i balabe, 'allah'. Tahale kothaya tadera phirano hacche
29|62|allah tamra bandadera madhye yara jan'ya icche tara riyika bariye dena ebam yara jan'ya icche simita karena. Niscaya allah sabakichu samparke samyaka abagata.

29|63|Ara yadi apani taderake jijnasa karena, 'akasa hate bari barsana kare ke bhumike sanjibita karena tara mrtyura para?' Tara abasya'i balabe, 'allah'. Baluna, 'samasta prasansa allahara'i' [1]. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i eta anudhabana kare na.
